subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Soccer
Accidents and Safety
Drunken and Reckless Driving
Traffic Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: Charlie Davies, 24, a forward for the United States national soccer team at the time of his accident in October 2009, has not played in a top-flight game in nearly a year and a half.
snippet: Charlie Davies, 24, a forward for the United States national soccer team at the time of his accident in October 2009, has not played in a top-flight game in nearly a year and a half.
